titleStmt.title: Two treatises the first, entituled, The foode of the faithfull. The second Deaths welcome.
titleStmt.author: Garey, Samuel, 1582 or 3-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. R[oberts] for Iefferie Chorlton [sic],

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: S.G., i.e. Samuel Garey.
The first treatise has caption title reading: "The food of the soul"; the second has separately dated title page reading: "A short and necessary treatise entituled: Deaths welcome".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
